snippet: T-Mobile has said it will start selling Apple products in 2013, but will stop underwriting the cost of phones with its contracts. Is getting a $650 iPhone from T-Mobile a good deal? It can be - especially for heavy data users.
abstract: T-Mobile has said it will start selling Apple products in 2013, but will stop underwriting the cost of phones with its contracts. Is getting a $650 iPhone from T-Mobile a good deal? It can be - especially for heavy data users.

headline.main: Is the New T-Mobile Pricing a Good Deal?
headline.print_headline: Buy Your Own iPhone, and Save Money
